duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute business growth plans at key strategic accounts.
Lead the development and execution of innovative sales approaches to drive revenue and profitability growth.
Maintain and grow the existing customer base while increasing focus on pursuing and investing in new high-value accounts.
Work with Marketing to develop account strategies based on market analysis and customer segmentation.
Build processes to understand customer current/future requirements, detecting market trends and aligning product development, manufacturing capabilities, and investment strategy.
Develop and build senior-level relationships internal and external to major accounts and targets.
